io.spine.server.aggregate

Class AggregateRoot<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.aggregate.AggregateRoot<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type for IDs of this class of aggregates

    @Experimental
public class AggregateRoot<I>
extends java.lang.Object
    A root object for a larger aggregate.

      • partState

        protected <S extends io.spine.base.EntityState,A extends AggregatePart<I,S,?,?>> S partState(java.lang.Class<S> partStateClass)
        Obtains a part state by its class.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the type of the part state
        Parameters:
        partStateClass - the class of the state of the part
        Returns:
        the state of the part or a default state if the state was not found
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a repository was not found, or the ID type of the part state does not match the ID type of this AggregateRoot
